title: Wayne Rooney makes Premier League title prediction as Liverpool battle Man City

Wayne Rooney has made his title prediction and backed Liverpool who top the Premier League as we enter the second international break of the season.

Liverpool were beaten to the title by just a single point last season as Manchester City secured back to back Premier League titles and England's two domestic competitions.

However, there was joy come the end of the season for the Reds as they won the Champions League for the sixth time.

And now former Manchester United and Everton striker Rooney has backed his old rivals to win the league title this season ahead of City.

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

"In my opinion, Liverpool look the strongest," Rooney said during an interview with IFL TV, cited by HITC .

"City are a fantastic team.

"I think Liverpool have improved on last year, whereas City have stayed at that level of great consistency, so I think Liverpool."

(Image: PA)

Jurgen Klopp's side have looked in fine fettle this season remaining unbeaten in their opening eight games of the season.

And Rooney's backing of a rival, one he has had since bursting onto the scene at the Toffees as an 16-year-old, shows how dangerous the German's side are this year.

After continuing their 100% start to the season with a last-gasp win over Leicester on Saturday, Liverpool head into the international break at the top of the table.

Whereas for United, things haven't gone to plan as they sit 11th in the table winning just twice under Ole Gunnar Solskjaer this season.

Manchester United face Newcastle on Sunday in a bid to bounce back from their defeat to West Ham last weekend.

Upon their return to league action the Reds face the Red Devils on their return to league action.
description: Former Manchester United and Everton forward backs former rivals for the title
